file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Dogbin API
  description: ''
  contact:
    email: dogbin@deletescape.ch
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://github.com/dogbin/dogbin/blob/master/LICENSE
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://del.dog/api/v1
tags:
  - name: auth
    description: Authentication
  - name: docs
    description: Documents
paths:
  /auth/login:
    post:
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: Login with an existing user
      operationId: login
      requestBody:
        description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        401:
          description: Username or password incorrect
          content: {}
        200:
          description: Succesfully signed in
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginResponse'
  /auth/logout:
    post:
      tags:
        - auth
      summary: Sign out (Delete session)
      operationId: logout
      parameters:
        - name: key
          schema:
            type: string
            example: c6g37GHLadXI90lOb22O5136zvODZIDf7jcUk5Jw
          description: The api key of the session
          in: query
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successfully signed out
          content: {}
  /docs:
    get:
      tags:
        - docs
      summary: Lists all documents of the authenticated user (given the `list` permission has been requested and granted)
      responses:
        200:
          description: List of all documents
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DocumentList'
        401:
          description: Api key missing, session ended, or not enough permissions
      security:
        - api_key: []
components:
  schemas:
    LoginRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        username:
          type: string
          example: user
        password:
          type: string
          example: password
        permissions:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
            enum:
              - create
              - update
              - delete
              - list
        application:
          type: string
          description: A human readable application name
          example: dogbin Android
      required: [username, password, permissions]
    LoginResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        username:
          type: string
          example: user
        key:
          type: string
          example: c6g37GHLadXI90lOb22O5136zvODZIDf7jcUk5Jw
          description: API key for the user, to be used in X-Api-Key header
    DocumentList:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          slug:
            type: string
          created:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          link:
            type: string
          type:
            type: string
            enum:
              - url
              - paste

  securitySchemes:
    api_key:
      type: apiKey
      name: X-Api-Key
      in: header
